QuestData.Title: Parasol Components
QuestData.Description: Sheets of fine cloth, wooden parasol ribs, wooden dowels and metal braces, everything you would need to put together new parasols. These are worth a lot of gold in the Ember Ward. Mats would certainly reward you handsomely if you brought him this cache.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return the components to Sanctuary of the Mad.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Mats at the Sanctuary of the Mad.
QuestData.RewardText: Oh, wow, this is a real find you have. Here, a heap of Infused Rubies for the bundle, the best you will see here in the ward. And if you see one of my goods you might like, let me know.
